context.text: List of airports in Canada (A-B) - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Airport name ICAO TC LID IATA Community and province
Due to the size of the list it has been broken down into:
Airports that are part of the National Airports System are emphasized .

Airport name as listed by either the Canada Flight Supplement (CFS) or the airport authority, alternate name, International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO) code, Transport Canada Location identifier (TC LID) International Air Transport Association (IATA) code, community and province.
This is an alphabetical list of terrestrial airports , water aerodromes and heliports in Canada . They are listed in the format:
^ Runway crosses the United States / Canada border
